DOC.brief_summary: The objective project test feasibility electronic mail recruitment web screen hazardous drinking , compare different approach encourage screening , estimate effect minimal extensive feedback preparation future alcohol web-based brief intervention study
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study aim test feasibility electronic mail recruitment web screen alcohol problem , compare different approach encourage screening , estimate effect minimal extensive feedback preparation future alcohol web-based brief intervention study . To , 4300 freshman adult college student randomize receive electronic mail request complete web alcohol screen test use alcohol-specific general wellness approach . The primary outcome proportion respondent complete alcohol screening . Additional outcome include readiness change drinking , help-seeking , alcohol consumption consequence . The result pilot study provide information useful 1 ) college decide best implement universal screen hazardous alcohol use , 2 ) preparation large study web-based screening brief intervention hazardous drink college student .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age older Full time student College freshman
